title: Course for Improving Clinical Skills Competencies Using Synchronous Video

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Educational environment centered on non-real-time video content and practical assignments optimized for smartphone-based learning.

learning_goals: Perform basic clinical skills (blood pressure measurement, injection techniques, etc.) with ≥85% accuracy using synchronized video demonstrations
Submit online practical assignments with ≥90% completion rate through self-directed learning and incorporate feedback
Improve clinical judgment skills to ≥80% accuracy rate by analyzing simulation and case-based video scenarios

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
